surname Hong
red/popular/revolutionary/bonus
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Hongshan district of Chifeng city 赤峰市, Inner Mongolia

(bird species of China) scarlet minivet (Pericrocotus speciosus)

sentences.english: Hongshan culture jade large tomb tombs seem to have a certain combination.
sentences.chinese: 红山文化大型墓殉葬的玉器似乎都有一定的组合。

sentences.english: But he said that the works were ugly like Hongshan culture.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他却说“要‘丑’得像红山文化”。

sentences.english: Long There is no doubt that the Hongshan culture from the Northeast.
sentences.chinese: 龙毫无疑问，就是出自东北地区的红山文化。

sentences.english: Students in Hongshanhu and Kaisandao have to get to school by boat.
sentences.chinese: 红山湖和开山岛的学生得乘船去上演。

sentences.english: Liaoning and Inner Mongolia and Hebei border area of the Hongshan culture.
sentences.chinese: 辽宁内蒙古和河北交界地带的红山文化。

sentences.english: The Hongshanhou site (NP) excavated in Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 内蒙古红山后遗址发掘。

sentences.english: So far, I do not see what is inside the tomb of Fu Hao Hongshan jade.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，我没有看出妇好墓里哪些是红山的玉器。

sentences.english: Hongshanzui port is the history of Sino-Mongolian trade route.
sentences.chinese: 红山嘴口岸历史上是中蒙贸易通道。

sentences.english: How many does the Hongshan-Culture ancient jade have?
sentences.chinese: 红山文化古玉器到底有多少？

sentences.english: And try on excavating some sites, name Hong Shan culture.
sentences.chinese: 试掘一些遗址，命名了红山文化。

sentences.english: All the evidence indicate that it have the characteristic of S type granite.
sentences.chinese: 上述特征表明，红山岩体属于S型花岗岩范畴。

sentences.english: Ongshan Mountain is the highest spot in the center of the city.
sentences.chinese: 红山是该市中心的最高点。

sentences.english: Hongshan culture jade groups have emerged, most with birds and beasts as the main body.
sentences.chinese: 红山文化涌现出的玉器群，多数以鸟兽形为主体。
